_description: A Spring song of love to Jesus — five l0-line stanzas (ababccbddb)

BLHar2253.First Lines: When y se blosmes springeant here foules song…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…at oure lyues endewhen whe shule wendeiesu vs
                    vndefong

BLRoy2Fviii.First Lines:
Nv Yh she blostme spryngeHic herde a fuheles
                    song…
BLRoy2Fviii.Last Lines: …Wan Ih shal henne wendeIesu me hvnderfonge Amen
